headline: Show HN: Emotion Driven Development, rethinking project management
description:
Hello everyone. I have created a project management service to help improve work environments by focusing on how employees feel about their work. All employees are very used to being viewed simply as a commodity and the current state of project management tooling reflects that. Traditionally the primary metric management is interested in is velocity. Velocity alone does not get to the heart of how productive a project is or how sustainable that productivity is. Onomojo seeks to change that by making employee sentiment the primary focus in project management. Day after day, if you are grinding on work that you aren't happy with you will eventually burn out and switch jobs. By focusing on how employees feel about their work, we can better prioritize stories so people are working on things they're actually interested in. We put employee sentiment first.

I've been working on this for about 10 months and I'm pretty happy with how it's progressing. The site is built with a Ruby on Rails API and a Nuxt frontend running on Heroku.

I'd love to hear your feedback on how I can improve the user experience, messaging, or any other ideas you might have. Thanks
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 情感驱动发展，重新思考项目管理
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 情感驅動發展，重新思考項目管理
description_zh-Hans:
大家好。我创建了一个项目管理服务，通过关注员工对其工作的感受来帮助改善工作环境。所有的员工都非常习惯于被简单地视为一种商品，项目管理工具的现状也反映了这一点。传统上，管理层关注的主要指标是速度。仅仅是速度并不能说明一个项目的生产力如何，也不能说明这种生产力的可持续性如何。Onomojo试图通过使员工的情绪成为项目管理的主要焦点来改变这种状况。日复一日，如果你在你不满意的工作上磨磨蹭蹭，你最终会精疲力尽并换工作。通过关注员工对其工作的感受，我们可以更好地确定故事的优先次序，这样人们就可以从事他们真正感兴趣的工作。我们把员工的感受放在第一位。

我在这方面已经工作了大约10个月，我对它的进展情况相当满意。该网站由Ruby on Rails API和运行在Heroku上的Nuxt前端构建。

我很想听到你的反馈，告诉我如何改善用户体验、信息传递，或者你可能有的任何其他想法。谢谢
